mapper.select: SELECT oc.crop_name AS cropName,SUM(op.pluck_weight) AS weight FROM orchard_pluck op LEFT JOIN orchard_plant opl ON op.plant_id=opl.plant_id LEFT JOIN orchard_crop oc ON opl.plant_crop_id=oc.crop_id LEFT JOIN orchard_garden og ON op.pluck_garden_id=og.garden_id LEFT JOIN orchard_address oa ON og.garden_address_id=oa.address_id WHERE YEAR(op.pluck_cret_time)=YEAR(NOW()) AND crop_name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY oc.crop_name ORDER BY weight DESC
